title: Showing Sunday: Freshly Remodeled 2bd/1bth in Heart of Castro Valley
posting_body: DO NOT RESPOND TO THIS ADVERTISEMENT.

Located at 19991 Santa Maria in Castro Valley, this upstairs apartment features two large bedrooms with spacious closets, a large, eat-in kitchen, an oversized living room, and a private rooftop terrace.
This unit comes with a private, enclosed (detached) garage with an automatic garage door, as well as one uncovered parking space.
The unit was freshly painted and has brand new laminate wood floors.
Estancia is small, well taken care of, pet-friendly community (of all types and sizes) within walking distance to many shops and restaurants and BART.
We have on site, coin operated laundry featuring brand new, highly efficient washer and dryers.
DO NOT RESPOND TO THIS ADVERTISEMENT.
